The Foul-Smelling
â€œThe rice, the millet, the black gram,
The fruits of trees and fruits of vines,
Obtained by right means, they eat at night,
Not craving sensual pleasures, not speaking falsely.
When eating what is well-cooked, well-prepared,
Delicious food given by others,
Eating rice dishes,
You eat the foul-smelling, Kassapa.
